channel.title: pnpm Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest pnpm news and events.

item.title: Node-Modules configuration options with pnpm
item.description: There are many ways to create a node_modules directory. Your goal must be to create the most strict one but if that is not possible, there are options to make a loose node_modules as well.

item.title: Flat node_modules is not the only way
item.description: New users of pnpm frequently ask me about the weird structure of node_modules that pnpm creates. Why is it not flat? Where are all the sub-dependencies?
